00089 static PurplePluginPrefFrame *
00090 get_plugin_pref_frame(PurplePlugin *plugin) {
00091         PurplePluginPrefFrame *frame;
00092         PurplePluginPref *ppref;
00093 
00094         frame = purple_plugin_pref_frame_new();
00095 
00096         ppref = purple_plugin_pref_new_with_name_and_label(
00097                                                                         "/plugins/core/g15purple/proto_icon",
00098                                                                         "Show protocol icons");
00099         purple_plugin_pref_frame_add(frame, ppref);
00100 
00101         ppref = purple_plugin_pref_new_with_name_and_label(
00102                                                                         "/plugins/core/g15purple/text_size",
00103                                                                         "Smaller text");
00104         purple_plugin_pref_frame_add(frame, ppref);
00105 
00106         ppref = purple_plugin_pref_new_with_name_and_label(
00107                                                                         "/plugins/core/g15purple/time_choice",
00108                                                                         "Time format");
00109         purple_plugin_pref_set_type(ppref, PURPLE_PLUGIN_PREF_CHOICE);
00110         purple_plugin_pref_add_choice(ppref, "Disabled", GINT_TO_POINTER(0));
00111         purple_plugin_pref_add_choice(ppref, "14:34:56", GINT_TO_POINTER(1));
00112         purple_plugin_pref_add_choice(ppref, "14:34:56 PM", GINT_TO_POINTER(2));
00113         purple_plugin_pref_add_choice(ppref, "02:34:56", GINT_TO_POINTER(3));
00114         purple_plugin_pref_add_choice(ppref, "02:34:56 PM", GINT_TO_POINTER(4));
00115         purple_plugin_pref_frame_add(frame, ppref);
00116 
00117         return frame;
00118 }

00126 void get_time(char **t) {
00127 
00128     struct tm *ptr;
00129     time_t lt;
00130     static char str[200];
00131 
00132     lt = time(NULL);
00133     ptr = localtime(&lt);
00134     int choice = purple_prefs_get_int("/plugins/core/g15purple/time_choice");
00135     switch(choice) {
00136         case 0:
00137             break;
00138         case 1: strftime(str, 100, "%H:%M:%S", ptr);
00139             break;
00140         case 2: strftime(str, 100, "%H:%M:%S %p", ptr);
00141             break;
00142         case 3: strftime(str, 100, "%I:%M:%S", ptr);
00143             break;
00144         case 4: strftime(str, 100, "%I:%M:%S %p", ptr);
00145             break;
00146         default:
00147             break;
00148     }
00149     *t = str;
00150 }

00157 void set_protocol (PurpleBuddy *buddy)
00158 {
00159     char *proto = buddy->account->protocol_id;
00160 
00161         if (strcmp(proto,"prpl-aim") == 0) proto_icon = aim;
00162         else if (strcmp(proto,"prpl-bonjour") == 0) proto_icon = bonjour;
00163         else if (strcmp(proto,"prpl-gg") == 0) proto_icon =gadu;
00164         else if (strcmp(proto,"prpl-icq") == 0) proto_icon = icq;
00165         else if (strcmp(proto,"prpl-irc") == 0) proto_icon = irc;
00166         else if (strcmp(proto,"prpl-jabber") == 0) proto_icon = jabber;
00167         else if (strcmp(proto,"prpl-meanwhile") == 0) proto_icon = meanwhile;
00168         else if (strcmp(proto,"prpl-msn") == 0) proto_icon = msn;
00169         else if (strcmp(proto,"prpl-myspace") == 0) proto_icon = myspace;
00170         else if (strcmp(proto,"prpl-novell") == 0) proto_icon = novell;
00171         else if (strcmp(proto,"prpl-qq") == 0) proto_icon = qq;
00172         else if (strcmp(proto,"prpl-silc") == 0) proto_icon = silc;
00173         else if (strcmp(proto,"prpl-simple") == 0) proto_icon = simple;
00174         else if (strcmp(proto,"prpl-yahoo") == 0) proto_icon = yahoo;
00175         else if (strcmp(proto,"prpl-zephyr") == 0) proto_icon = zephyr;
00176         else proto_icon = unknown;
00177 
00178 
00179 }

00189 void draw_messageWindow(g15canvas *canvas)
00190 {
00191     int maxLength;
00192     int maxNum;
00193 
00194     if (textSize == G15_TEXT_SMALL) {
00195         maxLength = 40;
00196         maxNum = 5;
00197     } else if (textSize == G15_TEXT_MED) {
00198         maxLength = 32;
00199         maxNum = 5;
00200     } else if (textSize == G15_TEXT_LARGE) {
00201         maxLength = 20;
00202         maxNum = 5;
00203     } else {
00204 
00205     }
00206 
00207     g15r_clearScreen(canvas, G15_COLOR_WHITE);
00208     char *title;
00209     char *text;
00210     char *text1,*text2,*text3,*text4, *text5;
00211     char *buff[maxLength * maxNum];
00212     char *buff1[maxLength + 1],*buff2[maxLength + 1],*buff3[maxLength + 1],*buff4[maxLength + 1],*buff5[maxLength + 1];
00213     char *num[5];
00214     int textLen;
00215     int titleLoc;
00216 
00217     title = g15title;
00218     text = g15message;
00219     textLen = strlen(text);
00220     sprintf(num,"%d",textLen);
00221 
00222 
00223     memset(buff, 0, sizeof(buff));
00224     memset(buff1, 0, sizeof(buff1));
00225     memset(buff2, 0, sizeof(buff2));
00226     memset(buff3, 0, sizeof(buff3));
00227     memset(buff4, 0, sizeof(buff4));
00228 
00229     strncpy(buff, text,textLen);
00230     text = buff;
00231 
00232     strncpy(buff1,text,maxLength);
00233     strncpy(buff2,text+maxLength,maxLength);
00234     strncpy(buff3,text+maxLength*2,maxLength);
00235     strncpy(buff4,text+maxLength*3,maxLength);
00236     strncpy(buff5,text+maxLength*4,maxLength);
00237 
00238     text1= buff1;
00239     text2= buff2;
00240     text3= buff3;
00241     text4= buff4;
00242     text5= buff5;
00243 
00244 
00245     if(purple_prefs_get_bool("/plugins/core/g15purple/proto_icon")) {
00246         g15rx_drawXBM(canvas, proto_icon, proto_width, proto_height, 1, 0);
00247         titleLoc = 12;
00248     } else {
00249         titleLoc = 1;
00250     }
00251 
00252     if (textSize == G15_TEXT_SMALL){
00253         g15r_renderString (canvas, (unsigned char*)title, 0, textSize, titleLoc, 1);
00254         g15r_renderString (canvas, (unsigned char*)currTime, 0, textSize, 159-(4*strlen(currTime)), 0);
00255     } else {
00256         g15r_renderString (canvas, (unsigned char*)title, 0, textSize, titleLoc, 0);
00257         g15r_renderString (canvas, (unsigned char*)currTime, 0, textSize, 159-(5*strlen(currTime)), 0);
00258     }
00259 
00260     g15r_pixelReverseFill (canvas, 0, 0, 159, 6, G15_COLOR_WHITE, G15_COLOR_BLACK);
00261 
00262     g15r_renderString (canvas, (unsigned char*)text1, 0, textSize, 0, 8);
00263     g15r_renderString (canvas, (unsigned char*)text2, 0, textSize, 0, 15);
00264     g15r_renderString (canvas, (unsigned char*)text3, 0, textSize, 0, 22);
00265     g15r_renderString (canvas, (unsigned char*)text4, 0, textSize, 0, 29);
00266     g15r_renderString (canvas, (unsigned char*)text5, 0, textSize, 0, 36);
00267 
00268 
00269 }

00277 void draw_welcomeScreen(g15canvas * canvas)
00278 {
00279     int verLength;
00280     char* ver;
00281         char* ver1 = "v";
00282         char* ver2 = VERSION;
00283     ver = (char *)calloc(strlen(ver1) + strlen(ver2) + 1, sizeof(char));
00284 
00285     g15r_clearScreen(canvas, G15_COLOR_WHITE);
00286         g15rx_drawXBM(canvas, welcome, g15_res_width, g15_res_height, 0, 0);
00287 
00288     strcat(ver, ver1);
00289     strcat(ver, ver2);
00290 
00291 
00292     g15r_renderString (canvas, (unsigned char*)ver, 0, G15_TEXT_MED, 159-(5*strlen(ver)), 34);
00293 
00294     free(ver);
00295 
00296     canvas->mode_xor = 0;
00297 
00298     g15_send(screen,(char *)canvas->buffer,G15_BUFFER_LEN);
00299 
00300 }

00309 void draw_goodbyeScreen(g15canvas * canvas)
00310 {
00311 
00312     g15r_clearScreen(canvas, G15_COLOR_WHITE);
00313         g15rx_drawXBM(canvas, goodbye, g15_res_width, g15_res_height, 0, 0);
00314 
00315     canvas->mode_xor = 0;
00316     g15_send(screen,(char *)canvas->buffer,G15_BUFFER_LEN);
00317     sleep(1);

00327 /* you must g_free the returned string
00328  * num_chars is utf-8 characters */
00329 static gchar *
00330 truncate_escape_string (const gchar *str,
00331                                                 int num_chars)
00332 {
00333         gchar *escaped_str;
00334 
00335         if (g_utf8_strlen (str, num_chars*2+1) > num_chars) {
00336                 gchar *truncated_str;
00337                 gchar *str2;
00338 
00339                 /* allocate number of bytes and not number of utf-8 chars */
00340                 str2 = g_malloc ((num_chars-1) * 2 * sizeof(gchar));
00341 
00342                 g_utf8_strncpy (str2, str, num_chars-2);
00343                 truncated_str = g_strdup_printf ("%s..", str2);
00344                 escaped_str = g_markup_escape_text (truncated_str, strlen (truncated_str));
00345                 g_free (str2);
00346                 g_free (truncated_str);
00347         } else {
00348                 escaped_str = g_markup_escape_text (str, strlen (str));
00349         }
00350 
00351         return escaped_str;
00352 }

00354 static gchar *
00355 best_name (PurpleBuddy *buddy)
00356 {
00357         if (buddy->alias) {
00358                 return buddy->alias;
00359         } else if (buddy->server_alias) {
00360                 return buddy->server_alias;
00361         } else {
00362                 return buddy->name;
00363         }
00364 }

00366 static void
00367 notify_msg_sent (PurpleAccount *account,
00368                                  const gchar *sender,
00369                                  const gchar *message)
00370 {
00371         PurpleBuddy *buddy = purple_find_buddy (account, sender);
00372         if (!buddy)
00373                 return;
00374         set_protocol(buddy);
00375 
00376     char *title;
00377 
00378     if(purple_prefs_get_bool("/plugins/core/g15purple/text_size")) {
00379 
00380         textSize = G15_TEXT_SMALL;
00381         title = truncate_escape_string (best_name (buddy), 24);
00382     } else {
00383         textSize = G15_TEXT_MED;
00384         title = truncate_escape_string (best_name (buddy), 17);
00385     }
00386 
00387         char *body = purple_markup_strip_html (message);
00388 
00389     g15title = (char*)title;
00390     g15message = (char*)body;
00391     get_time(&currTime);
00392 
00393 
00394         purple_debug_info (PLUGIN_ID, "g15purple(), new: "
00395                                          "title: '%s', body: '%s', buddy: '%s'\n",
00396                                          title, body, best_name(buddy));
00397 
00398     draw_messageWindow(canvas);
00399 
00400     canvas->mode_xor = 0;
00401 
00402     g15_send(screen,(char *)canvas->buffer,G15_BUFFER_LEN);
00403 
00404     g_free (title);
00405 
00406 }

00408 static void
00409 notify_new_message_cb (PurpleAccount *account,
00410                                            const gchar *sender,
00411                                            const gchar *message,
00412                                            int flags,
00413                                            gpointer data)
00414 {
00415 
00416         notify_msg_sent(account, sender, message);
00417 }
00418 
00419 static void
00420 notify_chat_nick (PurpleAccount *account,
00421                                   const gchar *sender,
00422                                   const gchar *message,
00423                                   PurpleConversation *conv,
00424                                   gpointer data)
00425 {
00426         gchar *nick;
00427 
00428         nick = (gchar *)purple_conv_chat_get_nick (PURPLE_CONV_CHAT(conv));
00429         if (nick && !strcmp (sender, nick))
00430                 return;
00431 
00432         if (!g_strstr_len (message, strlen(message), nick))
00433                 return;
00434 
00435         notify_msg_sent(account, sender, message);
00436 }

00439 static void
00440 init_plugin(PurplePlugin *plugin)
00441 {
00442 
00443         canvas = (g15canvas *) malloc (sizeof (g15canvas));
00444     g15title = "        G15 Purple Plugin Loaded        ";
00445     g15message = "When a message is received, it will be  shown here. --Kabili";
00446 
00447         purple_prefs_add_none("/plugins/core/g15purple");
00448         purple_prefs_add_bool("/plugins/core/g15purple/proto_icon", TRUE);
00449         purple_prefs_add_bool("/plugins/core/g15purple/text_size", FALSE);
00450         purple_prefs_add_int("/plugins/core/g15purple/time_choice", 1);
00451 }
00452 
00453 static gboolean
00454 plugin_load (PurplePlugin *plugin)
00455 {
00456         void *conv_handle;
00457 
00458         conv_handle = purple_conversations_get_handle ();
00459         buddy_hash = g_hash_table_new (NULL, NULL);
00460 
00461         screen = new_g15_screen(G15_G15RBUF);
00462     g15r_initCanvas(canvas);
00463     draw_welcomeScreen(canvas);
00464 
00465 
00466 
00467         purple_signal_connect (conv_handle, "received-im-msg", plugin,
00468                                                 PURPLE_CALLBACK(notify_new_message_cb), NULL);
00469 
00470         purple_signal_connect (conv_handle, "received-chat-msg", plugin,
00471                                                 PURPLE_CALLBACK(notify_chat_nick), NULL);
00472 
00473 
00474 
00475         return TRUE;
00476 }
00477 
00486 static gboolean
00487 plugin_unload (PurplePlugin *plugin)
00488 {
00489         void *conv_handle;
00490 
00491         conv_handle = purple_conversations_get_handle ();
00492 
00493         purple_signal_disconnect (conv_handle, "received-im-msg", plugin,
00494                                                         PURPLE_CALLBACK(notify_new_message_cb));
00495 
00496         purple_signal_disconnect (conv_handle, "received-chat-msg", plugin,
00497                                                         PURPLE_CALLBACK(notify_chat_nick));
00498 
00499         g_hash_table_destroy (buddy_hash);
00500 
00501     draw_goodbyeScreen(canvas);
00502 
00503 
00504 
00505     //free(canvas);
00506     g15_close_screen(screen);
00507 
00508         return TRUE;
00509 }
